leylab_pipelines
=================

 General bioinformatic pipelines associated with the Ley Lab at the MPI in Tuebingen


#### Sections

- [Contents](#contents)
- [Examples](#examples)
- [Installation](#installation)
- [Usage](#usage)
- [Changelog](#changelog)
- [License](#license)


## Contents

[[top](#sections)]

### TECAN robot helper commands

`TECAN -h`

### Commands for working with bio databases

`LLP-DB -h`

### Misc commands

`LLP -h`


## Examples

[[top](#sections)]

### TECAN robot helper scripts

* See the bash scripts in:
  * `./examples/`


## Installation

[[top](#sections)]

### Testing

`python setpy.py test`

### Build

`python setup.py install`
